## StreamResponse.addEventListener() method

Registers a function that will be called whenever the specified stream event occurs.

**Signature:**

```typescript
addEventListener<E extends EnumOrLiteral<StreamEventName>>(eventName: E, cb: StreamEventCallback<E>): void;
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>

</td><td>

E


</td><td>

name of the event to listen


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

cb


</td><td>

[StreamEventCallback](./chat-core.streameventcallback.md)<!-- -->&lt;E&gt;


</td><td>

callback function to invoke when event occurs


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

void
